thread.title: VIDEO: Mbappe strikes again for rampant Monaco
thread.title_full: VIDEO: Mbappe strikes again for rampant Monaco

title: VIDEO: Mbappe strikes again for rampant Monaco
text:
0 12-Mar-2017 02:52:10 The precocious phenomenon notched his 10th of the league campaign to see his team past tricky opposition, with a typically poised finish 
Monaco wonderkid Kylian Mbappe is in unstoppable form, and just cannot stop scoring goals for the Ligue 1 leaders. 
The 18-year-old, who is earning rave reviews in France, was on hand to finish off Radamel Falcao's pass and give Monaco the lead against Bordeaux on Saturday. 
Joao Moutinho doubled the advantage, before a late goal for Diego Rolan acted as consolation for the downed visitors. 
Mbappe has now hit 10 in 21 games for the principality side, who currently sit five points clear of Nice at the league summit. Related
